chapter.title: Installing &vmim;
chapter.para: This section of the &vmim; book deals with the setup and instalation process.

section.title: Installing &vmim; software.
section.para: Run the python setup command to install from what ever format you chose

section.title: Installing &vmim; templates.
section.para: You will then need to modify the configuration file.
Copy the script into /usr/sbin set it executable.

section.title: Setting up the &vmim; configuration file.
section.para: The &vmim; configuration files are found in /etc/vmimagemanager/. The most important file is vmimagemanager.cfg. This file is documented elsewhere in the book.
